scripts.db:create: export NODE_ENV='development' && createdb metrorail-development && createdb metrorail-test
scripts.db:migrate: npm run psql:test && npm run psql:development
scripts.db:drop: osascript -e 'quit app "POSTICO"' && dropdb metrorail-test && dropdb metrorail-development
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run db:migrate
scripts.psql:test: cat db/models/trains.sql db/models/stations.sql db/models/passengers.sql | psql metrorail-test
scripts.psql:development: cat db/models/trains.sql db/models/stations.sql db/models/passengers.sql | psql metrorail-development
